tool_description: A tool that fetches the latest news articles from Nature.

input_types.num_articles: int - The number of articles to fetch (default: 100).
input_types.max_pages: int - The maximum number of pages to fetch (default: 5).

output_type: list - A list of dictionaries containing information about the latest Nature news articles.

demo_commands.description: Fetch the latest 100 news articles from Nature.
Fetch the latest 50 news articles from Nature, searching up to 3 pages.
